text: these DIY granola bites are exactly what
you want to snack on and the beauty is
in the simplicity because it's just
whole ingredients there's no added
sweetener no preservatives nothing
artificial so let's get started take 2
cups of nuts of your choice I'm using
walnuts and almonds here and then just
pulse several times until they're finely
chopped ok looks great the reason you
want to pulse this and not leave the
motor running is that you run the risk
of creating a nut butter which is not
the end of the world but not the recipe
we're trying to create here we just want
that finely chopped now we'll do the
same thing for the dried fruit again 2
cups of dried fruit anything you want
I'm using medjool dates dried apricots
and dried cherries and pulse these
several times until they're finely
chopped a good way to know when this is
done is you'll see the mixture starting
to form a giant sort of mass and they're
all nice and finely chopped ok now let's
work on some seasoning
I have flaky sea salt here just a little
dab this is gonna help I'll bring the
sweetness in the dried fruit and the
nuttiness in the nuts pinch of cinnamon
and then this is a job for hands tool
for the task right you want to knead the
nuts with the dried fruit ok my mixture
is nice and combined so just roll into
about 1 inch sized balls now you could
also press this into a square baking
dish lined with parchment paper and cut
out squares or bars if you wanted to I
like the bites I think that makes it
more fun for snacking again a handy
dandy small scoop makes this really easy
work when you're forming the bites
squeeze pretty firmly to make sure they
adhere almost on one final finishing
touch
we're going to roll them in sesame seeds
the sesame seeds are going to add a
really nice crunch more healthy fats
what's not to love and then you can
transfer them straight away to a storage
container and you'll have snacks for a
week so we'll finish these up here just
steal these these are wonderful to keep
on your counter at home great to bring
into the office smart healthy snacking
at hand any time of the day
DIY granola bites why buy it when you
can make it mmm super tasty super
energizing this is going to power you
through your mid-afternoon slump
you
